mapper.select: SELECT m.no , m.name , m.id , m.email , m.phone FROM member m WHERE no = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE member m SET m.withdrawn_at = UNIX_TIMESTAMP() , m.status = 'WITHDRAWN' WHERE m.no = #{memberNo}
